result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Letter received from Atty Michael Kenitz dated 3/7/16
Summary of Plea Agreement - Amended
Def appears in custody & w/Atty Mike Kenitz.  Atty Mandy A. Schepper for State. Court orders case dismissed & read-in.

Def appears in custody & w/Atty Mike Kenitz.  Atty  for State.  Clerk: CP.  CASES CALLED:  15CF104, 15CF282, 15CF478, 15CM617.  Court questions State and counsel and expresses concern re amended complaint in 15CF282.  Court will not proceed w/out corrected amended complaint being filed in 15CF282 and anticipates ordering PSI before proceeding to sentencing.  Plea/sentencing scheduled for March 4, 2016 at 2:30pm.

Petition for Appointment of Attorney, Affidavit of Indigency and Order.
Plea hearing at 01-27-2016 09:45 am

Def appears in custody & w/Atty Mike Kenitz.  Atty Peter John Cannon for State.  Clerk: CP.  Negotiations ongoing - def has pending cases in Br 1 & Br 3; counsel not sure if cases will resolve indepent or gobally and req adj.  Atty Kenitz requests to be appointed on this case.    Court appoints Atty Kenitz.  Defendant shall reimburse Washington County w/the payment plan in 15CF104.  Plea hearing scheduled for January 27, 2016 at 09:45 am.
Hearing at 12-23-2015 09:45 am

Def appears in custody & w/Atty Mike Kenitz.  Atty Mark D. Bensen for State.  Clerk: CP.  Atty Kenitz has not been appointed on this case yet; expects 15CF104 to resolve independent of all other pending cases and req adj.  Hearing scheduled for December 23, 2015 at 09:45 am.
Hearing at 12-09-2015 01:15 pm

Def appears in person in custody.  Atty Mandy A. Schepper for State.  Clerk: CP  Def given complaint, advised of charges, penalties and rights; probable cause previously found.  Def states he was not aware of previous court hearing.  Court sets $300 cash bond.   State has been advised new Fleeing charges will be filed against def.  Def has 2 pending Br 4 cases, 1 pending Br 1 case and a pending Waukesha Co case; Atty Kenitz represents in other Wash Co cases.  Adjourned to allow defendant to appear with an attorney.  Hearing scheduled for December 9, 2015 at 01:15 pm.
